name: sap-sipper

effect.x-y: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.

short_effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

flavor_text.x-y: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Grass-type move.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Attack stat when hit by a Grass-type move.
